Our Services

Applicant Screening

We provide well trained civil unarmed security guards and supervisors for normal security duties and other supporting services as may be determined by our esteemed clients.

A detailed pre-employment back-ground screening of all guards is conducted to confirm that they have no criminal records. they are hones, physically fit, mentally alert, professionally trained and career oriented (male and female).

Training

Our guards after passing the basic applicant screening are trained in the following aspects

Operational security/standard operating procedure

Best practices in court security as well as international accepted rules of operational security will be a major training agenda not on a one-off basis but continously overtime

Emergency preparedness and response continuity of operations: the guards are trained on how to respond to emergencies including fire, riots, and natural disasters and how to follow court's operational plan for continuity of operations.

Threat assessment: this is a training on recognition of threat and calm, rational dissolution of such threat.

Threat assessment: this is a training on recognition of threat and calm, rational dissolution of such threat.

Security equipment usage: he proper usage, management and deployment of the various technological security equipment to be used at the court house.

Facility adaptation

This is an onsite training that basically recognizes the strengths and weaknesses of a particular building facility and the adoption of security procedures to maximize the security strenths of the facility while diminidhing its weakness

Control supervision

Our company is managed bya retired nigerian army captain who is a seasoned industrial security specialist. he is assisted bya team of experienced mangers, supervisor and guard's inspectors who make frewuent but unscheduled trips to all location with dedicated fit for purpose patrol vehicle, both day and night to ensure our guards are performing to specified standards. the management team provides a back-up supervising function.

Our major forms of control we exert include

Onsite supervisor/CSO

Control room operations

Patrol operations

Uniforms

Our uniforms are neat and attractive. awhite shirt over black trousers. security officers are also given ablack polo shirt which is used at night and weekends

Pricing and cost

Our prices are very competitive industry wide at on a national level. we take pride in the fact that value is derived from the expenses organizations pay on security when we are in charge of guard deployment and management. we are also very careful to ensure that our guards renumeration is also competitive so that we can have a satisfied workforce to manage your facility.

For more detail on the pricing, please reach out to our operation manager +234 (703) 84 564 989

What you should know

Faq / Locations

Does GCS provide services to government org too?
GCS has provided security guard services to several organizations, include and not limited to government organisations. We virtually serves every legit perimeters.
What if i have emergency, who can i call?
In a case of emergency, even though it is always a rarity, but we always ensure everything is being put in place in other to deal with emergency. use our contact page for more info.
What if i have emergency, who can i call?
In a case of emergency, even though it is always a rarity, but we always ensure everything is being put in place in other to deal with emergency. use our contact page for more info.
Can GCS provide service to sensitive orgs like bank?
Infact we do. At GCS we have professionals when it comes to security matters, both that are still in the force system and the retirees. So the answer is, we're sensitive and we can handle sensitive premises.
